name: Simple Google Analytics by ST
author: Sumanta Relkar

sections.description:
This is a simple plugin which allows you to include your Google Analytics tracking code in the website.

Support

  • (mailto:sumantrelkar@gmail.com)
sections.installation:
1. Upload sgabst-simple-google-analytics folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Option will be visible in the setting menu i.e. Add Google Analytics option.

NOTE: 1] Tracking code will not be active for the logged-in admin user.*
2] Please add valid tracking code in the text box of the plugin setting page.
3] If you will put invalid code or any other value instead of Google analytic code, then analytic code visible in the head section with invalid code.
sections.faq:
Can you modify this feature?

Yes, I’m trying to keep this as simple as possible, it’s a really useful feature.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Added uninstall functionality.

1.0.2

  • Updated latest Google Analytics tracking code.
  • Exclude logged-in admin user from tracking.
  • Fixed typo in plugin description.

1.0.1

  • New insert GA code hide and show functionality.

1.0.0

  • First released version.

short_description: Easily add google Analytic code from the wordPress administration screen.
